title: Frontend ReactJS Developer
description: Inventab is an SAAS based ERP that can be used by organizations to streamline their CRM, SCM, Production, HR, Engineering and other processes.

Inventab also comes with an eCommerce, Service Ticket Management linked to it. During my internship at Inventab, I developed front-end applications primarily using React JS and collaborated closely with backend developers to ensure seamless integration.
I integrated APIs into the front-end, transforming data into various formats for improved usability and created numerous graphs to visualize data insights.
Additionally, I designed and implemented an Employee Attendance System, enhanced overall design for a better user experience, and strengthened user authentication mechanisms.

title: Full Stack (MERN) Developer
description: At Gawaana, I was responsible for migrating an outdated PHP website to a modern React JS framework.
I built user authentication from scratch to ensure secure access, improved CSS design for a more appealing user interface, and integrated existing APIs for enhanced functionality.
Furthermore, I optimized app performance for faster load times and increased user click rates through various UI/UX enhancements.
